Plot: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.
Title: The Fast and the Furious
Writer: Ken Li (magazine article "Racer X"), Gary Scott Thompson (screen story), Gary Scott Thompson (screenplay), Erik Bergquist (screenplay), David Ayer (screenplay)
Actors: Paul Walker, Vin Diesel, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster
tomatoConsensus: Sleek and shiny on the surface, The Fast and the Furious recalls those cheesy teenage exploitation flicks of the 1950s.
